alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 12:03AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Mobile County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1203 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midtown Mobile to 5 miles northeast of Bayou La Batre to 5 miles southwest of Coden. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Saraland, Theodore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Creola, Semmes, I65 And I165, Coden, Mobile Regional Airport, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland
